Pathfinder Worker:
Rim Kamaloka is the latest means by which the Darkness Strikes at us -- this time, through our very dreams. Unless you whitstand the attack, you will die in your sleep.
Our Sages have determined that the best defense is to enter that place and mount a preemptive attack. If you have the courage, it is possible to challenge Rim Kamaloka and survive.
